sourcesContent:
Order Confirmation

Dear {{getOrder.name}}, Thank you for shopping with us!

Order Summary

{{getOrder.od}}

Order Id: {{getOrder.id}}   Product: {{product.name}}

Weight: {{product.quantity}}   Price: Rs. {{product.price}}   Ordered quantity: {{getOrder.quantity}}

Order Total

Payment mode: {{getOrder.payment}}

Total Price: Rs. {{(getOrder.quantity)*(product.price)}}

Shipping details

Shipping address: {{getOrder.address}},{{getOrder.state}}

Contact detail: {{getOrder.contact}}

Your order is on it's way. Thank you!
